thread.title: VIDEO: Kaka's brilliant free kick the first goal in new Orlando City stadium
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Kaka's brilliant free kick the first goal in new Orlando City stadium

title: VIDEO: Kaka's brilliant free kick the first goal in new Orlando City stadium
text:
0 26-Feb-2017 06:20:48 The Brazilian star opened the scoring in a pre-season win over Saint Louis FC, marking the inaugural goal at Orlando City Stadium. 
Orlando City christened the club's new stadium Saturday — and it was none other than Kaka who offered up the opener. 
All you need to know about Orlando City 
The inaugural goal at Orlando City Stadium came as Kaka curled home a fifth-minute free kick in the Lions' 3-1 preseason win over second-tier Saint Louis FC. 5' | G LLLL! The Captain earns a free kick and buries the chance. Nice way to start things here. — Orlando City SC (@OrlandoCitySC) February 25, 2017 
Cyle Larin added a double before halftime as Orlando cruised to victory, with Saint Louis bagging a late consolation goal. 
After two seasons at the Citrus Bowl, Orlando will officially open its 25,500-seat stadium when New York City FC visits for the clubs' 2017 MLS opener March 5. Related
